class_notes: All nursing pre-reqs courses require department permission to enroll. For Emory SON permission you must email nrsgpermissioninquiries@emory.edu for registration approval and support.
course_description: This course focuses on human development from conception to death with an emphasis on the lifespan perspective. Cognitive, psychosocial, behavioral, sociocultural and ecological systems theories are explored as well as the impact of genetic and environmental factors.
sections: Class Nbr: 5120, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 8:30-11:20a, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
